summary: The US financial regulator says its official @SECGov account was “compromised,” resulting in an “unauthorized” post about the status of Bitcoin ETFs.
title: The SEC’s Official X Account Was ‘Compromised’ and Used to Post Fake Bitcoin News
detailed_content: THE OFFICIAL X account of the United States Securities and Exchange Commission was “compromised” this afternoon, resulting in the publication of an “unauthorized” post, according to SEC chair Gary Gensler. The account, @SECGov, also said the account had been compromised.
author: BY ANDREW COUTS
